description: Template for describing scripts or software code.

author.description: The author of the resource; preferably use an ORCID ID, GitHub profile link, etc., if available and a text name if not.
author.title: author

citation.description: Citation (e.g. doi) that usage of data or resource should be cited with.
citation.title: citation

license.description: License attached to the data. If indicates UNKNOWN or RESTRICTED-USE, data may not be used without further contact for terms.
license.title: license

runtimePlatform.description: Runtime platform or script interpreter dependencies (e.g. Java v1, Python 2.3).
runtimePlatform.title: runtimePlatform

documentation.description: URL to any documentation describing the resource and its use.
documentation.title: documentation

title: SourceCodeTemplate
